commenter_a: I would have to say too bad. There are reasons why adoption laws are written the way they are. Do they think they are the only "couple" who have this issue. There are countless stories of parents who adopted a child, got divorced, and one of the "parents" wanting to change the legal definition of the legal parent-child relationship.
